message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product at a special price of $14000. I think you'll find it's worth every penny!
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $11000 for it.
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $11000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $12500 for it.
I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal! However, I'm not willing to go above $13500. I'm willing to make a slight concession, but I think $13500 is the maximum I can offer. What do you think?
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $12800 for it.

I'm starting to think we're getting a bit too far apart. I'm willing to make a serious concession and meet you at $13000, but I'm not going any lower. This is my final offer. What do you think?
